thread.title: Golf-Thomas replaces Johnson as world number one

title: Golf-Thomas replaces Johnson as world number one
text:
May 13, 2018 / 11:40 PM / Updated 15 hours ago Golf-Thomas replaces Johnson as world number one Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
PONTE VEDRA BEACH, Fla., May 13 (Reuters) - Justin Thomas became golf’s new world number one on Sunday, ending fellow American Dustin Johnson’s 15-month reign.
“It means a lot, but it’s something I want to have for a long time, not something I just want to have once,” Thomas said at the Players Championship where he tied for 11th.
Thomas won his first major at the PGA Championship last August.
The 25-year-old has won eight times on the PGA Tour. Reporting by Andrew Both; Editing by Ian Ransom
